src:
Real nije blistao, Garuba dvocifren! Baskonija razbila Bajern već u prvom poluvremenu
Španski timovi 2/2 u poslednjem terminu Evrolige za danas

01 Nov 2019


U poslednjem terminu za danas u Evroligi igralo se u Španiji. Real Madrid je otaljavao posao protiv Albe, nije blistao, ali je uspeo da dobije nemački sastav sa 85:71, dok je Baskonija dočekala i razbila Bajern već u prvom poluvremenu, a na kraju je slavio rezultatom - 93:60.

Kraljevski klub je u prvoj četvrtini već napravio razliku od 14 poena i delovalo je da će to biti klasična igra mačke i miša, ali nije bilo tako. Alba je pokazala zube, pokazala da nije došla u Madrid da bude samo posmatrač i uspela je da uvede meč u egal tok i da Realu u gostima ubaci 38 poena za poluvreme.
Verovatno Pablo Laso nije bio zadovoljan igrom svog tima, malo je našpanovao svoje igrače za drugo poluvreme i tek su u poslednjoj četvrtini igrači Reala uspelo da prelome utakmicu i dobiju i ubedljivije rezultatski nego što je to bilo na parketu.
Najefikasniji kod Real Madrida bili su Entoni Rendolf sa 12 poena, a toliko je ubacio i mlađani Usman Garuba koji je opet pokazao da ga čeka velika budućnost. Tome u prilog ide i činjenica da je šutirao 5/5 za dva poena.
Biće zanimljivo videti kako će se dalje razvijati Garubina karijera. Kod Albe Martin Hermanson dao 13, a po 10 su ubacili Mejson, Siva i Tieman.
Baskonija je odigrala fantastično prvo poluvreme protiv Bajerna iz Minhena i to je ekipi iz Vitorije omogućilo pobedu. Treća deonica je bila klimava za domaćina, Bajern je najavio da bi mogao da se vrati, ali se ekipe Velimira Perasovića na vreme probudila i uspela da smiri utakmicu, opet ode preko 20 razlike, pa i 30 razlike, i tu više povratka za tim Dejana Radonjića nije bilo.
Meč je odigran u napetoj atmosferi u poslednjoj deonici, bilo je dosta tenzija, gosti su bili nervozni zbog ubedljivog poraza, pa je na kraju došlo do koškanja Tornikea Šengelije i Grega Monroa. Brzo su razdvojeni pa nije eskaliralo u nešto ozbiljnije.
Do jedne od najubedljivijih pobeda ove sezone Baskoniju su vodili Šengelija sa 19 poena, Džening sa 16, Stauskas je dodao 12, a po 10 Garino i Polonara. U ekipi Dejana Radonjića najbolji je bio Greg Monro sa 18. Vladimir Lučić je ubacio četiri poena.

EVROLIGA - 6. KOLO


Četvrtak

Crvena zvezda - Himki 90:78/Simanić 18 - Šved 14/
Panatinaikos - Anadolu Efes 86:70/Rajs 18 - Larkin 28/

Petak

Zenit - CSKA 70:87/Ajon 20 - Džejms 16/
Fenerbahče - Žalgiris 76:79/De Kolo 29 - Grigonis 19/
Valensija - Asvel 81:72/Dubljević 13 - Livio 20/
Olimpija Milano - Barselona 83:70/Rodrigez 17 - Dejvis 15/
Olimpijakos - Makabi 65:90/Printezis 16 - Vilbekin 19/ Baskonija - Bajern 93:60/Šengelija 19 - Monro 18/
Real Madrid - Alba 85:71/Rendolf 12, Garuba 12 - Hermanson 13/






FOTO: Reuters
text:
Real didn't shine, Garuba double-digit! Basque break up Bayern in the first half
Spanish teams 2/2 in the last Euroleague term for today

01 Nov 2019


In the last term for today in Euroleague it was played in Spain. Real Madrid pushed the business away from Alba, did not shine, but managed to get the German squad with 85:71, while Baskonia met and smashed Bayern in the first half, eventually celebrating with the score - 93:60.

The Royal Club had already made a 14 point difference in the first quarter and it seemed like it would be a classic cat and mouse game, but it wasn't. Alba showed her teeth, showed that she did not come to Madrid to be a mere spectator, and managed to bring the match into an egal stream and score 38 points in the away half for Real.
Probably Pablo Laso was not happy with his team play, only spurred his players for the second half and only in the last quarter did Real players manage to break the game and get even more convincing results than they did on the floor.
The most efficient at Real Madrid were Anthony Rendolf with 12 points, and so much was injected by junior Usman Garuba who again showed that he had a great future ahead. This is supported by the fact that he kicked 5/5 for two points.
It will be interesting to see how Garuba's career progresses. At Alba, Martin Hermanson gave 13 and Mason, Siva and Tieman each scored 10.
Basque played a fantastic first half against Bayern Munich and this gave the team from Vitoria a win. The third section was a nod to the home side, Bayern announced that he could return, but the team of Velimir Perasovic woke up on time and managed to calm the game, again went over 20 differences, even 30 differences, and there is more return for Dejan's team Radonjic was gone.
The match was played in a tense atmosphere in the last section, there was a lot of tension, the guests were nervous about the convincing defeat, and in the end it came to Tornike Schengelia and Greg Monroe. They were quickly separated so it didn't escalate into something more serious.
One of the most convincing wins this season was Baskoni led by Schengelli with 19 points, Jennings with 16, Stauskas added 12, and 10 each with Garino and Polonara. Dejan Radonjic's best player was Greg Monroe with 18. Vladimir Lucic scored four points.

EUROLEAGUE - DAY 6


Thursday

Red Star - Khimki 90: 78 / Simanic 18 - Swede 14 /
Panathinaikos - Anadolu Ephesus 86: 70 / Rice 18 - Larkin 28 /

Friday

Zenit - CSKA 70: 87 / Ayon 20 - James 16 /
Fenerbahce SK - Zalgiris 76: 79 / De Kolo 29 - Grigonis 19 /
Valencia - Asvel 81: 72 / Dubljevic 13 - Livio 20 /
Olympia Milan - Barcelona 83: 70 / Rodriguez 17 - Davis 15 /
Olympiacos - Maccabi 65: 90 / Printezis 16 - Wilbeck 19 / Basque Country - Bayern 93: 60 / Schengelia 19 - Monroe 18 /
Real Madrid - Alba 85: 71 / Rendolf 12, Garuba 12 - Hermanson 13 /






PHOTO: Reuters
